channel.title: All Registered Polls for the Scottish Parliament
channel.description: All Registered Polls for the Scottish Parliament

item.title: Opinion Poll by Survation for The Courier, 29–30 March 2021 – Seat Projections for the Parties
item.description:
• Scottish National Party: 58–67 seats
  • Scottish Conservative & Unionist Party: 19–25 seats
  • Scottish Labour: 21–27 seats
  • Scottish Greens: 10–15 seats
  • Scottish Liberal Democrats: 6–12 seats
  • Alba Party: 0 seats

item.title: Opinion Poll by Survation for The Courier, 29–30 March 2021 – Seat Projections for a Selection of Coalitions
Opinion Poll by Survation for The Courier, 29–30 March 2021 – Voting Intentions
item.description:
• Scottish National Party: 34.0–40.0%
  • Scottish Conservative & Unionist Party: 15.7–20.5%
  • Scottish Labour: 16.7–21.6%
  • Scottish Greens: 9.2–13.1%
  • Scottish Liberal Democrats: 6.5–9.9%
  • Alba Party: 2.1–4.3%

item.title: Opinion Poll by Opinium for Sky News, 11–16 March 2021 – Voting Intentions
item.description:
• Scottish National Party: 39.5–45.4%
  • Scottish Conservative & Unionist Party: 19.9–24.8%
  • Scottish Labour: 16.9–21.6%
  • Scottish Greens: 5.7–8.7%
  • Scottish Liberal Democrats: 3.9–6.5%

item.title: Opinion Poll by Survation for Scotland in Union, 9–12 March 2021 – Voting Intentions
